column5: Fabulous Canton home with 4 bedrooms 3 baths, custom pool, hot tub, huge entertaining space, great kitchen, and couldn't be closer to the First Monday Trades Days!  2x King Size Beds, 1x Queen Bed, 1x Futon, 1x Sectional, 1x Large Couch   We are very knowledgable about shopping in Canton and can answer any travel questions you may have! We welcome you to come workout at our gym in town for FREE!
